entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , East Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:52 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , East Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C

entry.title: Friday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:51 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 12:51 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 late in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 12:51 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
